mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mulford's Widal Test Outfit
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: H. K. Mulford Co. [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This set contains items needed for conducting a Widal test to detect typhoid. The set includes: 30 c.c stock bottle Typhoid suspension, 30 c.c stock bottle salt solution, 10 c.c dropping flask used for dropping Typhoid Suspension, 10 c.c droping flask used for dropping salt solution, 6 graduated test tubes used in making tests, graduated pipette, 12 small capillary bulbs or tubes to collect the blood serum, needle.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical laboratory technology
